# headless-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute       | Description                                                                                          | Type                                           | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaDisabled`       | `aria-disabled` | Indicates that the element is perceivable but disabled, so it is not editable or otherwise operable. | `string`                                       | `undefined` |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`      | Indicates whether the control is disabled, meaning that it does not accept any clicks.               | `boolean`                                      | `undefined` |
| `priority`           | `priority`      | Type of button action                                                                                | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"`       | `undefined` |
| `properties`         | --              | Spreadable object for button element properties                                                      | `Partial<HeadlessButton> & { text?: string; }` | `{}`        |
| `reactiveAttributes` | --              |                                                                                                      | `{ [x: string]: any; }`                        | `undefined` |
| `role`               | `role`          |                                                                                                      | `string`                                       | `'button'`  |
